name: SMASH BOY Ver.KZ
description: Fight your way through an army of… evil ladies?! Smash Boy is a single-player mouse-based action game. Enjoy simple but fast paced combat as you battle against large groups of enemies in this 2D beat ‘em up. Customize your own unique and skill combinations to suit your playing style.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP以降 Processor: Core i3 3.2GHz以上 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
